title: Interpretation of gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of buying gold in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream of wearing gold in a dream for a single woman.

preview.html: What is the interpretation of gold in a single woman’s dream? Interpretation of gold in a single woman’s dream. It is said that the symbol of gold is not always interpreted with good, and there are many cases in which gold is interpreted with evil. In the following lines, you will know that when you see gold in a woman’s dream it is not For a married woman, this indicates reassuring signs and meanings. Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of gold in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about gold for a single woman is benign and full of goodness. If the dreamer sees these visions in his dream: Check out a car made entirely of gold and diamonds: It symbolizes high status, prestige, and abundant material capabilities. Seeing gold horses: It indicates She has a great position and status, as the dreamer will be a distinguished girl from other girls, and God will give her glory, prestige, and many abilities and skills that she will use to change her life to a better level. Seeing a young man offering her golden shoes: It indicates that the dreamer is about to get married and that her life partner will be in a state of affairs. His life will be good and his life will be luxurious and provide her with comfort, stability and a happy material life. Seeing a golden chain with Ayat al-Kursi written on it: It indicates preservation and protection from any spiritual dangers, or in a clearer sense, that the dream indicates the immunity of insight from the harm of demons in reality. Seeing a golden pen Precious: It actually means good work, creativity, and the enjoyment of many skills. The interpretation of the symbol of gold in a dream for an unmarried woman will be bad if she sees these visions: Seeing the color of gold fading: It indicates sadness, failure, or illness and may indicate the dissolution of clashes or the loss of money. Vision Broken pieces of gold jewelry: It indicates a widening gap between the dreamer and her fiancé, especially if she dreams that her engagement ring is broken or cracked. Seeing the gold ring turning into rusty iron: It is interpreted as a radical and negative change in the dreamer’s relationship with the young man to whom she was engaged in the recent past. Or the dream may indicate negative changes in the dreamer’s work, and these changes may push her to leave the job. Interpretation of gold in a dream for a single woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that gold in an unmarried woman’s dream could indicate lost and wasted money or upcoming good deeds and a lot of money that You will get it, and there is a big difference between the two interpretations, which is the details of the vision that reveal whether the meaning of the dream is positive or not? As follows: Seeing wearing a large, heavy gold chain: It symbolizes an increase in the number of responsibilities and problems in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a large piece of gold: It is not interpreted well, because it indicates anxiety, distress, and a life full of worries. Displaying gold coins: It portends prosperity and abundance of money. Or reaching a job promotion through which the dreamer gains a high position in society and a lot of money as well. Check the golden network: It indicates an engagement, even if the dreamer is already engaged and waiting for her wedding day in reality, this vision is evidence of a happy marriage. The dreamer’s vision denotes

title: Interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream: Many wonder about the difference in opinions of scholars regarding the interpretation of getting engaged in a dream, as the interpretation of any vision always varies according to the condition of the person who saw it and depending on the details of this vision. In following the lines of this, we will present to you many opinions about the interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream for a girl. The single woman, the married woman, and the traveler as well, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. The girl who sees her engagement in a dream shows her constant striving and effort to achieve what she wants. Seeing an engagement in dreams foretells approval of a marriage contract and getting married. Seeing an engagement in dreams can also symbolize optimism and love of life. If Someone saw his engagement in a dream, this may also indicate that he feels a great ongoing affection. Also, seeing an unmarried woman who is engaged to her in a dream may herald her engagement to an honest, loyal, and fair person and she will be happy with him, God willing. Seeing a girl dancing during her engagement in a dream It means that she is going through a financial crisis. Seeing a girl wearing a wedding ring in a dream is a sign that she will find a job she wants and will obtain a position. Seeing a friend’s engagement and wearing a ring in a dream indicates his marriage. To dream of buying an engagement dress symbolizes an imminent trip, God willing. Seeing A young man who went to propose to a girl and was approved in a dream means that you will achieve what you want. Seeing someone attending his father’s engagement in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is constantly searching for a certain thing. Seeing a young man preparing for his engagement party in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s constant feeling of loneliness. Interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream. Interpretation of an engagement in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing engaged couples in a dream is good news about the emergence and fulfillment of desires. If a girl sees that someone she knows is getting engaged in a dream, this is a sign that she will achieve what she seeks and achieve her ambitions. Seeing a virgin girl getting engaged In a dream, it means that she will get the job she desires in a prestigious position. Interpretation of seeing an engagement in a single woman’s dream: Seeing an unmarried girl at an engagement party in a dream symbolizes the arrival of a groom who is not suitable for her and will not be satisfied with him. Seeing an unmarried woman in her dream at her engagement party indicates To marry a person of great status and destiny, God willing. Seeing an unmarried girl entering in her dream is good news that she will marry a righteous man whom God will be pleased with, God willing. Seeing an unmarried woman on Friday night entering into a dream indicates the arrival of goodness, joy and happiness in her life. An unmarried woman seeing in her dream that she is watching a friend’s engagement, and she was already engaged, expresses the dreamer’s relationship with someone who does not suit her. For an unmarried woman to see that she is engaged in a dream to someone she loves, this indicates her strong desire to be associated with this person, and her engagement with him is good news and a blessing. Interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream for a man: Seeing a young man engaged to a beautiful girl in a dream symbolizes the arrival of happiness in his life. A man who dreams that he is engaged to a girl indicates his constant pursuit of life’s pleasures. Seeing a young man in a dream in which a girl came to propose to him alone.

title: Interpretation of a cousin in a dream: Seeing my cousin in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of a cousin indicates success, confidence and security. Either other dreams like my cousin sitting next to me, or my cousin loving me, or looking at me, or hugging me, or holding my hand or kissing me, or seeing my deceased cousin, or quarreling with my cousin about single, married and pregnant women. Both the divorced woman and the man have completely different interpretations, and the Arab commentator Ibn Sirin will inform you. Interpretation of a cousin in a dream: Seeing a cousin in a dream means that the person who sees him is very loved by his family and relatives and is appreciated and respected by his surroundings. Whoever sees his cousin in a dream means that he is a person who attaches great importance to Family values ​​and shows his natural personality. At the same time, this dream shows that the person always takes the necessary measures to prevent anyone from spoiling the peace and comfort of the family. The relationship between the dreamer and his cousin clearly and frankly defines the purpose and meaning behind seeing him in a dream, as the cousin is considered one of the closest members of the family Because he is almost on the brother's side, and sometimes we find him closer to the fortuneteller than his brother. The man's cousin in a dream is his supporter and supporter and is a symbol of trust and confidence. The fortuneteller can interpret the dream of his cousin through the meaning of the name as well as appearance and speech. Whenever these elements are positive in the dream, they indicate a topic or material that is good, God willing. A cousin’s dream of his cousin’s unmarried daughter is a sign and sign of good luck and happy news, and this is if he sees the unmarried woman in his dream as if her cousin is proposing to her or marrying her. As this vision foretells. A great love fills her heart and her life with happiness and may foretell an almost marriage. Whoever sees his cousin, this vision is evidence of the closeness of that person to his cousin and that he is an honest and generous person. This dreamer will soon meet a good woman and they will build their nest together. The dream also expresses the presence of a very dear friend whom everyone praises. It expresses About the dreamer being in an environment of good people and gaining great fame from everyone. It also indicates the need to visit the family. Some interpreters believe that the presence of your cousin in your dream indicates some problems and crises that the person will face, whether materially or morally. Dream interpreters state that the psychological analysis of seeing a cousin In a dream it is very familiar, especially if it is one of the people the dreamer talks to every day. In fact, what is reflected in one's dreamsOn the other hand, people who are far from a person and whom he longs for and wants to see can be seen in one's dreams, just as one sees people whom one loves and always meets, as one can in the subconscious see one's own relatives, members of one's family And the people that a person thinks about: Interpretation of a cousin in a dream for a single woman. As for a cousin in an unmarried girl’s dream, it usually symbolizes good luck, especially if she sees him in a dream proposing to her or marrying her. Therefore, the dream has many positive meanings, including that the girl may meet a new love. Which fills her heart with joy and happiness, and perhaps this indicates the nearness of marriage. Interpretation of a cousin in a dream for a man: He is considered a cousin

title: I dreamed that my mother died and I cried for her

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing my mother dead and crying over her in a dream for an unmarried girl. When a single girl sees the death of her mother in a dream, this is evidence that she is looking for someone to communicate with. Crying over the death of her mother in a dream is good news that the problems and worries will go away and the comfort that will come to her, God willing. She was crying for the mother’s condolences. In the girl’s dream, she was wearing black. This dream indicates that this house will be filled with guests on happy occasions and joy will enter, God willing. In the event that the mother carries a burden on her necks, this indicates that this girl will reach her high house. Receiving your mother’s condolences in a dream is A sign of good news in the future. See also: Interpretation of seeing a living or dead mother in a dream and its meaning. The witness’s interpretation is that my mother died and I cried for her in a dream about a married woman. Whoever dreams of his mother’s death and burying her while she is crying over her does not deserve praise, indicating a passing health crisis. Screaming about death A mother in a dream for a married woman is good news that goodness will come to her. Burying the mother after her death in a dream for a married woman is evidence of the disappearance of the problems she faced in her life. In the event that a married woman sees the death of her mother in her dream and shrouds her, this means that she will visit the Holy House of God. If she receives Condolences to the mother in a dream means that this woman’s husband will make profits from the trade he is doing. When a married woman sees that her mother is carrying her by the neck, this indicates the high position she will attain. Interpretation of seeing my mother died and I cried for her in a dream about a man and its meaningWhen a man dreams that his mother Dying and crying over her. It is just a sign of the improvement in the material condition that he will move to, and he will also gain comfort in the proximity of God. Carrying one’s mother on one’s neck in a man’s dream means that he will reach a high position in social life. In the event that this man sees that he is standing in His mother’s funeral and people comforting him, this is good news for the news that makes him happy. The death of a mother in a dream after a visitor comes to his house indicates the blessing that will dominate his life in general. Seeing the mother’s shroud in a dream by the one who sees it after her death means that he will be able to pay off the accumulated debts He must. For a man to bury his mother after her death, this symbolizes the problems that he will be able to get rid of. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a mother having sex with her daughter. The meaning of seeing a mother died and I cried for her in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. When a pregnant woman sees the death of her mother and cries over her, this indicates that she will give birth. In peace.To receive a mother’s condolences in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes that she will receive congratulations on her safe recovery from the birth process.Seeing the last moments of a dying mother in a pregnant woman’s dream.Unpopular indicates that you will suffer from problems during pregnancy.He will also suffer from trouble, and God alone He knows the truth of the vision. A pregnant woman wrapping her mother in her sleep is good news that she will safely give birth to a child after giving birth. Carrying the mother on her neck is only a sign of the high social status she will reach. Interpretation of seeing my mother died and I cried for her in a dream for a young man

title: The symbol of eating sweets in a dream

preview.html: But seeing sweets in a dream worries a group of people and they soon want to know the meaning of this vision, so we will provide an interpretation of the symbol of eating sweets in a dream. The symbol of eating sweets in a dreamWhen the dreamer generally sees in his dream the symbol of eating sweets. It is one of those dreams that indicates that he hears Good news, and very enjoyable for the dreamer in general. If the dreamer sees that he is eating large amounts of candy during his sleep. This vision means that the dreamer will be able to achieve all the dreams and desires that he was always thinking about in the previous moments of his life. As for the dreamer who sees that He eats candy and that it tastes delicious, and he wants to eat as many of them as possible during the dream. This vision indicates that good things will happen in this person’s life and that his life will change for the better very significantly from what he was living. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is eating candy, but he feels By her taste, it is spoiled sweets. This vision means that this person cares about matters of his appearance and outward appearance only and does not care about the content of these matters. You may be interested in: Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing the symbol of eating sweets in a dream for a single girl. Most dream interpreters reported that seeing One girl in her dream eats sweets in general. It is one of the dreams that brings signs of joy to this girl, because it shows that she will soon communicate with the person she wanted to be her share. About an unmarried girl who sees that a young man she knows well gives her sweets and eats them in a dream. This vision indicates Until this girl will establish an emotional relationship with this young man and will feel high levels of love that have never touched her heart before. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is eating candy of different colors. This vision shows that this girl will enjoy her next life and that she will leave all the things that she used to add to her life. Her life. Watching a single girl eating sweets with her friends on a special occasion while sleeping. This vision indicates that the wedding of one of this girl’s friends is imminent and that they are planning well to attend this occasion in their most appropriate appearance. Interpretation of seeing the symbol of eating sweets in a dream for a married woman. All scholars have gathered Interpretation of dreams and some sheikhs and jurists say that seeing a married woman eating sweets in general in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates the stability of this woman’s marital life and that she feels high levels of happiness next to her husband and her family. About a married woman who dreams that her husband himself gives her in a dream something to eat. It is evidence that this person loves her unnaturally and is trying with all his efforts to make her live happily. When a married woman sees herself attending a big event with her husband, they are eating sweets together at the party while sleeping. This vision indicates the earliest date of pregnancy for this woman, Glory be to Him, And this good news will raise her to higher levels of joy and happiness. If a married woman sees a lot of sweets inside her house in a dream, this vision means the expected joy and comfort for this woman and for all her family members.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about heavy rain for singles according to Ibn Sirin? Interpretation of dreams about heavy rain at night for a single woman and interpretation of heavy rain in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about heavy rain for a single woman indicates many good news that will come to her in the next few days, taking into account other details that she may see in her dream and changing the meaning of the dream, so we will find out through the following lines that you are in. Mention the opinions of interpretation scholars on this dream. Interpretation A dream of heavy rain for a single woman. What is the interpretation of a dream of heavy rain for a single woman? If a girl is anxious or sad, the interpretation of a dream of heavy winter for a single woman carries meanings of calm and confidence in the next stage of her life. Interpretation of a dream of heavy rain for a single woman in winter, a metaphor for the prosperity she is experiencing With her family if she is still young and not of marriageable age, but if she is of marriageable age, then it is about marrying a man who has a lot of money and with whom he lives in a state of luxury and spaciousness. One of the details that can be disturbing in a girl’s dream is that she sees rain As if pieces of salt were hitting her window hard from outside causing her to panic. News about someone who loves him very much. If she is engaged to someone she loves and wants to stay with him for life, her marriage will take place soon, and seeing heavy rain in her dream is a sign of the development of their lives and the improvement of their standard of living after that. marriage. Seeing her walking in the rain, not knowing what is happening to her, and enjoying it, is evidence that she is going through a very bad psychological state and wants to get rid of all these sorrows inside her, but she is... Does she not find anyone to share her sorrows with? What is the interpretation of a dream about heavy rain for single people according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin is one of the great translators who indicated that rain in a dream expresses many good deeds, the end of judgments, and the achievement of goals for anyone who has a goal and ambition to strive for. The girl who sees It is raining heavily on the roof of her house to the point that the water is leaking inside the house. This is a good sign that money is flowing to the father, who spends a lot of it on his family members, especially the visionary who has a special place in the father’s heart. According to Ibn Sirin, rain is a sign of an answered prayer. If The girl was suffering from anxiety or illness at that time, so everything will be fine as long as she is a good girl away from sins and disobedience. Interpretation of a dream about heavy rain at night for single womenIt is assumed that the darkness and stillness of the night was created by God to comfort people after the fatigue of the day, but in the event of rain It rains heavily at this time, so there is a kind of discomfort and anxiety that prevails. For us, then seeing rain and hearing its loud sound during the night is evidence of many things going on in her mind, which makes her feel more anxious and disturbed. Hearing a loud noise as a result of thunder coinciding with the rain is a sign of the extent to which her self-confidence has been shaken and therefore she cannot make a decision with confidence, but rather She remains hesitant and misses many good opportunities. But if she sees that there is someone sitting with her at night and trying to hide from him for fear of the sounds of the rain at night, then she will find someone who will protect her, strengthen her, and compensate for her excessive tenderness. the

title: Interpretation of sweets in a dream: Seeing buying sweets in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of sweets or sweets for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether she eats, distributes, makes, buys, or sells, according to Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq. Sweets and foods in origin, which if they are seen as if they are eaten, indicate the goodness of life and salvation from Danger, pleasure and comfort, sugar cane, repetition of permissible and sweet words, and one sugar before me. I am a lover or a boy, and great drunkenness shows what has been said and said. Group Interpretation of a dream about sweets by Ibn Sirin: If a person sees in his dream that he is eating a large amount of delicious and beautiful-tasting sweets, then this is evidence that this person loves doing good and always tries to get closer to God with good deeds and worship, and this person is loved by people and they trust him for his strength and justice. But if Someone saw in his dream that he was buying a candy that he liked, and this person had a big problem and could not solve it. This vision promises him good news that his problem will be solved and he will feel calm after being tired. And suffering. But if one sees in his dream that he is making sweets and appears happy, it means that God will provide the dreamer with abundant sustenance, and if the dreamer is in debt, he will pay off his debts. Eating sweets in a dream is a source of joy for you and a sign of good health that you will enjoy in your life. Seeing yourself eating sweets in a dream is an improvement in your financial circumstances and a cure for diseases that threaten your health. Eating sweets in a dream for a single woman Eating sweets in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates an approach to socializing and getting to know your life partner, and this relationship will be crowned with success and marriage. If you dream of an unmarried girl If a married woman sees that she is making sweets, this means that she will hear good news, whether it is success in her studies or a new job. But if an unmarried woman sees that she is giving sweets to someone she knows, this is evidence of mutual love between her and that person. As for an unmarried woman, who sees herself buying sweets This indicates that she will soon marry a good young man and live with him happily. Eating sweets in a dream for a married woman. As for a married woman, eating sweets is a solution to problems that lead to the dissolution of the marital relationship for both parties, and the return of closeness, happiness, and stability. If a married woman sees that she is making sweets And if she is sterile or has never given birth, then this dream is a good omen that she will get close to pregnancy. But if a married woman sees that her husband buys her sweets or makes sweets for her, this indicates mutual love and tenderness between her and her husband and shows that they will live with love and stability. And if there are disagreements between them This vision is good news for resolving those differences and restoring stability and reassurance to her life again. Eating sweets in a dream for a pregnant woman Eating sweets in a dream for a pregnant woman means that you will soon have a male child, in order to begin preparations and buy things for your child. If a pregnant woman sees that she is eating sweets She is happy and is in the first months of pregnancy, so this vision indicates that she is pregnant with the woman. But if she sees

title: A wristwatch in a dream is good news

preview.html: As for a married woman, it shows abundant food and success in matters, as she plans them. As for a man, it indicates that he is an organized person in his life and seeks to achieve his goals. Interpretation of seeing a wristwatch in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees a wristwatch in her dream. This indicates her commitment. With her religion, it suggests that she will get married early. But if he sees the metal of the watch made of gold. This is clear evidence of her marriage to a very wealthy man who will provide her with all the means of happiness and comfort. If an unmarried girl sees the metal of the watch made of silver. This indicates that they will have romantic friendships. If An unmarried girl saw a watch standing, then there is a malfunction. This indicates the dissolution of her marriage based on some commentators, not all of them. In the event that a girl sees that someone in a dream gives her a watch. This indicates that a loved one on the way will give her a gift. Seeing a watch in a dream for a girl Unmarried indicates the things that you need to achieve from her. It is necessary to complete everything related to him on time and without any delay. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch as a gift. Interpretation of seeing a wristwatch in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman indicates that she is buying a wristwatch. This indicates The stability of her life and the happiness and comfort of herself and her husband. When a married woman sees that she has lost her watch, this indicates the emergence of marital problems and disputes. If a married woman sees that she is taking off the watch, this indicates a change in her life. But if someone gives a gift with a watch in a dream, this indicates On how much people love her. If he sees the clock rotating in the opposite direction, this indicates life crises and old age. Likewise, if a married woman sees that the clock falls opposite to the usual place, it indicates exhaustion and old age. If you see yourself buying a watch, this indicates problems And the difficulties that you will face in your life. If you see a gold watch, this indicates that one of the girls will get married soon. Interpretation of seeing a wristwatch in a dream about a man and its meaning. If one sees a wristwatch in his dream, this is a sign that he will achieve his goals. He will achieve all his goals even after a long time Seeing a watch in a man’s dream may mean that he has achieved the highest degree of precision in his work. If a man sees himself buying a wristwatch in a dream, this means that he will buy a house. Or he will open a new project, make plans and laws for it, and be very disciplined. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a watch In a dream in detail, the meaning of seeing a wristwatch in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. If a pregnant woman sees a wristwatch in her dream, this is a sign that she knows the sex of the baby, whether male or female. Therefore, he urges them to speed up knowing the sex of the baby. Seeing a pregnant woman with a wristwatch during her sleep is an indication that she She will give birth to a beautiful girl, and this is what major commentators have relied on in the great interpretation of dreams. A pregnant woman sees a gold watch in her dreams, this indicates that her due date is imminent. Her birth will be smooth and easy and she will give birth to a very beautiful child. Interpretation of seeing a wrist watch in a dream for young people and its meaningIf a young man sees in his dream A wristwatch, this

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving a black rosary in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a gift of a black rosary in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about a gift of a black rosary in a dream, and it is one of the interpretations that some people want to know what this dream means and whether it is a sign of good or evil. In fact, the dream and its interpretation are good, and it is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about giving A black rosary in a dream: Giving a black rosary in a dream may indicate the abundance of livelihood that the dreamer may gain during this time, and God knows best. A person dreams that he received a black rosary in a dream as a gift, which may indicate a lot of money and a great source of livelihood that he can obtain. In those days. If one sees himself taking the black rosary in a dream, this may indicate goodness that will come to him in the next season thanks to God. Everyone who dreams of giving someone a black rosary may indicate joys coming at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of giving saffron in Dream: It is possible that seeing a gift of saffron in a dream indicates the dreamer’s good morals, and God knows best. A dream about giving saffron in a dream may indicate the good nature of the dream and his closeness to those around him. If a person sees that he is giving saffron to those around him, this may indicate the good deeds that he does To others, thanks to God. In the event that you see a gift of saffron in a dream, it may indicate the fulfillment of desires and dreams during this period, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about a mother giving gold to her daughter in a dream. If a girl sees that her mother was giving her gold as a gift, this may indicate that she will be fine in that. Time, and God knows best. A dream of a mother giving gold in a dream to her daughter may indicate the wide life that the girl may have in those days. Anyone who sees in her dream that she is receiving gold from her mother in a dream may indicate positive changes occurring in her life during that period. If he sees If a mother gives a soccer ball to her daughter in a dream, this may indicate that she holds a high position and succeeds in practical life, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream of a husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream: A woman who sees her husband giving her a nightgown may indicate positive changes occurring in her life during this period. By the grace of God. The dream of a husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream may indicate the emotional closeness that is occurring between them at this time, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing the husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream may indicate the fulfillment of desires and desires during this period, and God knows best. I know. Seeing the husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream may indicate a happy event coming to the family in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of giving away cigarettes in a dream: Giving away cigarettes in a dream may indicate the generosity that the dreamer enjoys at this time, And God knows best. In the event that a person sees that he is giving another person cigarettes as a gift, this may indicate the presence of new friends entering his life during this period. It is possible that seeing a gift of cigarettes in a dream indicates the sincerity of the feelings that the person having the vision has at that moment. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream
